Flight and hotel booking in the palm of your hand
Low Price Guarantee on China hotels
"Ctrip.com is China's leading online travel agent, serving customers in China and around the world in eight different languages."
There was an issue accessing your calendar.
Your booking was successfully added to your calendar.
Only one guest name should be entered for one room.
Please check in for your flight on time. %1$s, %2$s (Departing: %3$s)
Please check in to your hotel on time. %1$s, (%2$s)
Cancelation failed. Please try again or contact us for help.
Are you sure you want to cancel this reservation?
We cannot auto-locate you. Please select your city manually.
The check-in date cannot be earlier than today’s date. Please select again.
Requires one of the following IDs:
Departure city must be different with arrival city.
Must be at least 20 characters long.
Sorry, the system is busy and your comments were not successfully submitted. Please try again.
Your review of (%1s)will appear after it has been approved.
Your comment has been successfully submitted. Thank you.
An application requires an update to the Android Wear app.
"This app won't run unless you update the Android Wear app."
"This app won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone."
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet."
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
An application requires Google Play services to be enabled.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
An application requires installation of Google Play services.
An application requires an update for Google Play services.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
Google Play services, which some of your applications rely on, is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
"This app won't run unless you update Google Play services."
Are you sure you want to delete this?
Prices in currencies other than CNY are for reference only. Actual price will be calculated based on currency exchange rates on the date of transaction.

C-Money is credit that can be earned by booking eligible hotels on Ctrip. C-Money can be used for discounts on prepaid hotel bookings. C-Money is valid for three years from the time it is credited to your account.
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
Failed to submit your reservation, please try again or select another hotel or roomtype.
Credit cards issued outside of Mainland China
Please check the card holder name.
Last 4 digits of credit card number
Please check the last 4 digits of your credit card number.
Please check the credit card No.
Please select credit card expiration date
Please enter your Chinese name if you are using a Chinese ID card.
A Chinese name must have at least two Chinese characters.
Please enter your name excluding Mr./Ms.
You have entered a Chinese ID number, please select the correct ID type.
Please enter the English name on your selected ID.
Please enter your name in Simplified Chinese.
Feedback submission failed. Please try again.
Your feedback has been submitted. Thank you.
Please leave your email address and feedback to receive a response as well as a chance to win C-Money.
Note: Right now you can only book adult tickets on this app, if you want to book child or infant tickets, please call us at 400-920-6662" "
Each ticket at this price must be purchased together with CNY %1$s in C-Money.
Please wait a moment and try again.
The CNY %1$s in C-Money you purchased with your flight can only be used after you have completed your account registration. Please contact Ctrip customer service to complete your registration.
Duplicate passenger names are not allowed.
The flight you have chosen is sold out. Please try another flight.
Please refer to official information from the airport for final confirmation.
Flight status not found. Please try again or search by %s.
Departure/arrival times are in local time.
You have exceeded the number of flights you are able to track
You are already tracking this flight
Failed to stop tracking this flight
You are not tracking this flight
Forgot your password? Contact us for assistance on 400 920 6662 (Mainland China) or (86 513) 8918 6110 (outside Mainland China)

The name you entered is too long. (Max. %1$d characters)
Please omit your middle name or use initials for your given name(s). Your family name must be identical to your passport, but you may delete spaces.
E.g. Moreira de Souza Silva (last name) / Marina (first name), can be MoreiradeSouzaSilva/M
Home Return Permit for Hong Kong Residents
You have not installed a navigation app on this device.
ID type applied for the card
Unable to log in due to an invalid account or password.
Incorrect flight number. Please try again.
Unable to find your location. Please try again.
This helps Ctrip find the nearest hotel for you.
\"Ctrip\" would like to use your current location
Please turn on location services to allow Ctrip to determine your location.
Credit card issued inside Mainland China
Mainland Travel Permit for Taiwan Residents
A maximum of 50 recently viewed hotels can be stored at a time. Recently viewed hotels will replace the oldest records.
Total cost given below may change. Check confirmation email for final cost.
You are not tracking any flights. Once you begin tracking a flight, you will receive a message about the flight status.
(This service is free. You can track up to five flights.)
Name must be the same as on the ID type selected
Sorry, roomtype not bookable,please decrease room quantity or select another roomtype.
Sorry, roomtype not bookable,please decrease room quantity or select another roomtype.
Oops, system busy, please try again later
Credit card issued outside Mainland China
Please check your credit card info.
Please set your PIN on the website (My account > C-Money) or call Ctrip.
Failed to process your payment, please try again.
No result match your search terms. Change your search terms and try again
Please check your network setting or try again.
Displays the last 4 digits of your credit card number the next time you use it.
Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?
This price does not include taxes and fees. We will contact you as soon as we are able to calculate these charges.
The lastest total price is CNY %s.
You are currently using the latest version.
Sorry, this flight is not available now, please try again or go back and select another one.
You have already submitted a review for this hotel.
This email has already been registered, please login or register withanother email address.
Are you sure you want to exit the app?
We will confirm by email within 24 hours.
Adding hotels to your Wishlist can speed up the hotel reservation process.
Click the Wishlist icon on the hotel details page to add a hotel.
